Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo shows a damaged road in Sri Lanka when it is actually a road in Bangladesh.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading photo that has been circulating since 2016.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the damaged road shown in the photo is in Sri Lanka, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the photo shows a road in Bangladesh, as evidenced by the analysis of the photo and the presence of Bangladeshi cricket team jerseys in the image.
